short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly view e-shop reviews! Supports Slovakia, Czechia, Hungary, Romania, Croatia, Slovenia, Serbia, Bulgaria, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly Check Reviews for Any E-Shop – Shop Smart, Shop Safe!

Discover the power of informed shopping with our Chrome widget, designed to give you real-time access to review counts on over 20,000 e-shops in Slovakia and the Czech Republic. Say goodbye to endless research—our widget lets you see a store’s credibility with a single glance, so you can confidently make purchasing decisions without the guesswork.

Features:

- Instant Review Summary: View total review counts for e-shops as you browse, directly in your browser.
- Easy Installation & Use: Just add to Chrome, and our widget automatically activates on supported sites.
- Stay Secure: Your privacy is our priority; we don’t track your browsing or collect personal data.

Perfect for online shoppers who value trust, transparency, and simplicity. Make every online purchase with confidence—get the  ReviewedShops Chrome extension today!
